citations.desc: Cleaning, sanitization, housekeeping, and pest control.
citations.narrative:
At time of inspection all three sheltered housing facilities had a significant infestation of rodents. An abundance of rodent
fecal matter and live mice were observed in the indoor portion of the sheltered housing facilities. An infestation of rodents
can cause disease issues and contaminate animal food stuffs. The licensee must implement an effective program that
reduces the infestation of rodents in order to promote the health and well-being of the animals.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with Licensee.
n

narrative:
3.11(d)  Repeat
   
Cleaning, sanitization, housekeeping, and pest control. 
At time of inspection all three sheltered housing facilities had a significant infestation of rodents. An abundance of rodent 
fecal matter and live mice were observed in the indoor portion of the sheltered housing facilities. An infestation of rodents 
can cause disease issues and contaminate animal food stuffs. The licensee must implement an effective program that 
reduces the infestation of rodents in order to promote the health and well-being of the animals. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with Licensee.
